name: Fried Chicken Wings
instructions: In a large bowl, marinate the chicken wings in buttermilk for at least 30 minutes.
In another bowl, mix the flour, paprika, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a deep fryer or large pot to 375°F (190°C).
Dredge the wings in the flour mixture, shaking off excess.
Fry the wings in batches until golden and crispy, about 8-10 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot.
